PostToolUse.command: filepath="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$filepath" == */frontend/* && ("$filepath" == *.ts || "$filepath" == *.tsx) ]]; then npx --prefix frontend eslint --fix "$filepath" 2>/dev/null; fi

PreToolUse.command: filepath="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$filepath" == *.env* || "$filepath" == *lock* || "$filepath" == *docker-compose.yml ]]; then echo 'BLOCKED: Sensitive file â€” confirm manually'; exit 2; fi
